entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 6:56 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: E 13 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this evening then changing to a few rain showers or periods of drizzle after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
